comment._content: Now, here's an interesting comparison shot. "In Norton's basin, The Nepean River(NSW)" circa 1885, photographed by Charles Bayliss, in the collection of the National Library of Australia: nla.gov.au/nla.pic-vn4218525

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Norton's Basin is near Warragamba Park, which in turn nearby where the Nepean River meets the Warragamba River. I have a suspicion that during the mid to late 19th Century there was a track leading to a certain spot which was probably the perfect place to take one of these photographs or paint the perfect view. Google map: maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&... Information about Warragamba Park mentioning Norton's Basin: www.npansw.org.au/web/conservation/Latham/proposed%206-2-...
